Traits.Name: Sturdy
Traits.Description: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

Traits.Name: Living Statue
Traits.Description: When defeated, becomes a height 2 piece of terrain.

Actions.Name: Combat Subroutine
Actions.Description: At the start of combat, the idol must Mark a foe. The idol has hatred of that character and its attacks gain +1 boon and true strike against them. It cannot mark a new character until its first character is defeated or the mark is removed.
